inclusion.criterion: Willingness to maintain AREDS vitamin supplements
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous or current use of L-DOPA containing medication
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent use of monoamine oxidase (MAO) inhibitors
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: BCVA worse than 20/100 in the eye with better BCVA
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current, or history of, neovascular AMD in either eye
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Neurologic conditions which can impair vision
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Wegener's granulomatosis and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
